alert.note: Alert for Brooke; Hancock; Marshall; Ohio (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 01 at 5:08AM EST until February 04 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation possible. Total snow and sleet accumulations between 3 and 6 inches and ice accumulations between one tenth and three tenths of an inch possible. * WHERE...Portions of east central Ohio. Portions of northwest, southwest, and western Pennsylvania. Portions of northern and the northern panhandle of West Virginia. * WHEN...From late Wednesday night through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel could be nearly impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
